document_data.name: ''Belt of Inertial Barrier''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''belt of inertial barrier''''' was a powerful [[magic]]al item that offered significant protection to its wearer.
document_data.Powers:
When worn, the belt surrounded an individual with a pocket of air that was significantly more dense than usual. This barrier shielded the wearer from various types of physical harm.

Some of these belts even offered protection from projectiles, harmful [[spell]]s, and other hazards such as the breath weapon of a [[dragon]].
document_data.History: The [[pirate]] [[Hoisure|Hoisure the Prudent]] commissioned a number of these belts be made for his crew.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Xithiss]], a [[mindflayer]] who worked for [[Baeloth Barrityl]] in his coliseum the [[Black Pits]].
